ITEM.SOURCE: ` CHECK bloc_size <> value. CHECK bloc_size > 0. bloc_size = value. f_has_changed = abap_true.
` CHECK weight_fieldname <> value. weight_fieldname = value. f_has_changed = abap_true.

LOCAL.TYPES: ` *"* use this source file for any type declarations (class *"* definitions, interfaces or data types) you need for method *"* implementation or private method's signature
LOCAL.IMPLEMENTATIONS: ` *"* local class implementation for public class *"* use this source file for the implementation part of *"* local helper classes
LOCAL.MACROS: ` *"* use this source file for any macro definitions you need *"* in the implementation part of the class INCLUDE ygpl_mt_conditions_macros.

ITEM.SOURCE: ` DATA i_conditions TYPE ti_full_conditions. super->compare_with( conditions ). TRY. i_conditions ?= conditions. simple_compare text-bls me->bloc_size i_conditions->bloc_size. simple_compare text-wfn me->weight_fieldname i_conditions->weight_fieldname. CATCH cx_sy_move_cast_error. * Ignore this error ENDTRY.

` DATA i_conditions TYPE ti_full_conditions. super->merge_with( conditions ). TRY. i_conditions ?= conditions. set_bloc_size( i_conditions->bloc_size ). set_weight_fieldname( i_conditions->weight_fieldname ). CATCH cx_sy_move_cast_error. * Ignore this error ENDTRY.
